General.Name: Hangzhou Innover Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Innover Technology Co., Ltd. offers urban gas equipment and smart gas solutions in China. It provides smart IC card and NB-IOT diaphragm gas meters, NB-IoT data collector, IoT smart flowmeter, XFUA/XFUB gas ultrasonic flowmeter, ultrasonic gas meter, diaphragm gas meters, gas turbine and roots flowmeters, smart Bluetooth card product, gas leak alarms, and self-services terminals. The company also offers smart gas IOT collection cloud platform for gas data collection and analysis; iBS smart gas business cloud platform; Fengyunhui mobile application payment system, an integrated mobile payment solution. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
